entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
